InternalError.description: The server encountered an internal error. Please retry the request.

InvalidUri.description: The requested URI does not represent any resource on the server.

NotImplemented.description: This operation has yet to be implemented.

OperationIdNotFound.description: The specified operation Id is not found.

OperationTimedOut.description: The operation could not be completed within the permitted time.

ServiceUnavailable.description: The server (or an internal component) is currently unavailable to receive requests. Please retry your request.
